article_title: The Fonz has completely lost it – twitchy.com
article_text:
Full stop. Yes, please! Stop making us collapse in giggle fits, Mr. Winkler.

Yeah, she's full of it, and she won't stop. Period. @hwinkler4real @joanwalsh — David Jack Smith (@davidjacksmith) October 24, 2013

And you know Winkler’s for real because his Twitter handle says so. A selection of links about “thoughtful” lapdog Joan Walsh:

https://twitter.com/twitr_patter/status/393335930100006912

@twitr_patter @joanwalsh but found it again this morning …it was on the hall table — Henry Winkler (@hwinkler4real) October 24, 2013

Related:

Full Twitchy coverage of Henry Winkler
